title: Which is the best sample paper for class 12 science? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: Oswaal Books Sample Question Papers are the best. It helps in brushing up all the important concepts and theories with it’s exam tools like On Tips Notes and Mind Maps. It includes 5 solved question papers and 5 self-assessment papers with hints covering important concepts from an examination perspective. All typologies of questions specified by CBSE included for examination success. It also gives answers from CBSE marking scheme with detailed explanations as per the word limit for perfection in answering final examination question. You will also get features like Quick reviews, Answering tips to facilitate in-depth study. Hence, this book is very useful for your exam preparations. Hope this helps!
